did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Speeches, news clippings, subject files, photographs, corresponence, certificates.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Papers relating to James Perkins' career before coming to Cornell; speeches and articles; files relating to his inauguration as Cornell's president; files relating to activities at Cornell, including the events of 1969; subject files relating to other activities; a few photographs and personal letters; and certificates and honorary degrees.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Papers relating to James Perkins' career before coming to Cornell; speeches and articles; files relating to his inauguration as Cornell's president; files relating to activities at Cornell, including the events of 1969; subject files relating to other activities; a few photographs and personal letters; and certificates and honorary degrees.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: James A. Perkins papers, #3-10-3158. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: See also James A. Perkins Papers, #3-10-1022.

arrangement.head: SERIES LIST
arrangement.p:
Series I. Speeches, lectures, and addresses
Boxes 1 and 2

Series III. Cornell Presidency
Boxes 4 and 5

Series IV. International Council for Educational Development
Boxes 5 and 6

Series V. Miscellaneous personal papers
(Letters, invitations, interviews, honorary degrees, clippings)
Boxes 6 and 7

scopecontent.p: Includes copy of a 1978 letter sent to Perkins from President of Oberlin College Robert Fuller about increasing enrollment of black students, Perkins had forwarded this letter in 1995 to Robert Miller.

did.unittitle: Defense Advisory Committee on Education in the Armed Forces (Award)

scopecontent.p: Contents include a picture passport, two caps and tassels, a Cornell guest book as well as the numerous honorary degrees, which Perkins received from colleges and universities across the country
